item.title: General Python knowledge that I found interesting
item.description: Python is a versatile programming language that can be used in many ways. Although my journey through python had just started, Iâ€™ve noticed little things that I can do through python that may be very useful to me in the future. For example, using the findall() function from the re module, I can match certain numbers that I desire from a string and print them all out. This function is useful when extraction of certain information is desired, such as IP addresses.
